statements: DELETE FROM user_activity WHERE user_id = 123 AND activity_type = 'login';
DELETE FROM user_activity WHERE user_id IN (SELECT id FROM users WHERE role = 'admin');
DELETE FROM user_activity WHERE timestamp < NOW() - interval '30 days';
DELETE FROM UserActivity WHERE user_id = 123 AND activity_type = 'login';
DELETE FROM UserInteractions WHERE user_id = 456 AND interaction_type = 'like' AND interaction_timestamp > '2022-01-01';
DELETE FROM UserInteractions WHERE user_id IN (SELECT user_id FROM UserActivity WHERE activity_type = 'logout');

DELETE FROM user_interaction WHERE interaction_id = 500 AND interaction_type = 'Update';
DELETE FROM compliance_logs WHERE log_id = 200 AND event_type = 'Violation';

DELETE FROM user_roles WHERE user_id = 5 AND role_name = 'admin';
DELETE FROM user_logs WHERE user_id = 1 AND activity_type = 'login';
DELETE FROM user_permissions WHERE user_id IN (SELECT user_id FROM user_sessions WHERE session_end < NOW() - INTERVAL 1 DAY);
DELETE FROM user_devices WHERE user_id IN (SELECT user_id FROM user_permissions WHERE permission_type = 'admin');
